Package project

Class Team

java.lang.Object
project.Team
public class Team extends Object
The team class represents the team in the Broomstick Blitz game sports competition. It manages a list of athletes in the team and a list of reserve athletes. It provides methods for the team such as adding and removing athletes, swapping athletes and calculating team scores.
Version:
1.1, May 2023.
Author:
Jordan Redfern

  • Constructor Details

    • Team

      public Team()
      Constructs new Team object. Initialises the teamList and reservesList as empty ArrayLists.

  • Method Details

    • setTeamName

      public void setTeamName(String nameInput) throws NameException
      Sets the name of the specified string if the name meets requirements
      Parameters:
      nameInput - the name for the team
      Throws:
      NameException - if the name does not meet the requirements (between 3 and 15 characters inclusive, no special characters)

    • addToInitialTeam

      public void addToInitialTeam(project.Athlete athlete, String position)
      Adds an athlete to the initial team in a specific position when setting up the team If the team list is less than 4 then the athlete is added to the team list
      Parameters:
      athlete - the athlete to be added to initial team list
      position - the position of the athlete in the initial team

    • refreshInitialAthletes

      public void refreshInitialAthletes()
      Refreshes the initial athlete options for the team for use when creating a new team Creates four new Athlete objects with a contract price of 5000 and updates the initial athlete options list

    • getInitialAthletes

      public ArrayList<project.Athlete> getInitialAthletes()
      Returns the list of initial athlete options for the team. If the initial athlete options list is null, it is refreshed using refreshInitialAthletes();
      Returns:
      the ArrayList of athletes as the initial athlete options

    • getTeamName

      public String getTeamName()
      Returns the name of the team
      Returns:
      the name of the team

    • getReservesList

      public ArrayList<project.Athlete> getReservesList()
      Returns the ArrayList of athletes in the reserves
      Returns:
      reservesList an ArrayList of athletes in the reserves list

    • getTeamList

      public ArrayList<project.Athlete> getTeamList()
      Returns the ArrayList of athletes in the team, not including reserves
      Returns:
      teamList the list of athletes in the team

    • getTeamScore

      public int getTeamScore()
      Calculates and returns a total score for the team by adding all offensive and defensive scores of athletes
      Returns:
      the total score of the team

    • getOffensiveScore

      public int getOffensiveScore()
      Calculates and returns the total offensive score of the team's attackers
      Returns:
      the total offensive score of the team's attackers

    • getDefensiveScore

      public int getDefensiveScore()
      Calculates and returns the total defensive score of the team's defenders
      Returns:
      the total defensive score of the team's defenders

    • addToReserves

      public void addToReserves(project.Athlete athlete) throws LimitException
      Adds an athlete to the reserves list.
      Parameters:
      athlete - the athlete to be added to the reserves list
      Throws:
      LimitException - if the reserves list is already full (reserves list is capped at 5)

    • addToTeam

      public void addToTeam(project.Athlete athlete, String position) throws LimitException
      Adds an athlete to the team if the team is not full - if position is not specified it automatically assigns athlete to the position there are less of in the team
      Parameters:
      athlete - the athlete that is being added to the team (and if it is a reserve it is removed from reserves)
      position - the position the athlete is being added as - if null then the athlete's position will be whatever there are less of in the team
      Throws:
      LimitException - if the team list is already full

    • removeAthlete

      public void removeAthlete(project.Athlete athlete)
      Removes athlete from the team list or reserves list
      Parameters:
      athlete - the athlete that is to be removed from one of the lists;

    • swapAthletes

      public void swapAthletes(project.Athlete firstAthlete, project.Athlete secondAthlete)
      Swaps the positions of the two athletes within the team and reserves lists. If both athletes are both in team list or both in the reserves list then it does nothing.
      Parameters:
      firstAthlete - the first athlete to swap
      secondAthlete - the second athlete to swap

    • checkSwappable

      public Boolean checkSwappable() throws NoReserveAthletesException
      Checks if there are reserve athletes available for swapping
      Returns:
      true if there are reserve athletes available, false otherwise
      Throws:
      NoReserveAthletesException - if there are no reserve athletes available to swap

    • addAthleteAndSwap

      public void addAthleteAndSwap(project.Athlete added, project.Athlete swapped)
      Adds a new athlete to the team by swapping them with another athlete and moving that athlete to the reserve team
      Parameters:
      added - the athlete to be added to the team
      swapped - the athlete to be swapped out from the team

    • checkTeamReady

      public boolean checkTeamReady()
      Checks if the team is ready for a match
      Returns:
      true if the team has two attackers and two defenders, false otherwise

    • restoreAthletes

      public void restoreAthletes()
      Restores the stamina of all athletes in the team and reserves After calling this method all athletes will have their stamina restored

    • isTeamFull

      public Boolean isTeamFull()
      Checks if the team is full, meaning both the team and reserves list have reached their maximum capacity
      Returns:
      true if both reserves list and team lists are full, false otherwise
